name: Merging Meltdown
description:
Made for the Godot Game Jam #53, based on the prompt "Assembly Required".

Embark on an adventure to escape a strange facility. Use your power to fuse with objects across 15 stages.

Default Controls:

Left Key - Move Left

Right Key - Move Right

Space - Interact (Bounce, Merge and Discard)

R - Restart Level

9 - Skip Level
